summary:
Blaze President Dave Boden to Retire July 1 - Blaze has announced that President/Chief Transformation Officer Dave Boden will be retiring on Monday, July 1.

 Dave Walters Joins BOD at Exodus Lending - Blaze Vice President of Consumer Lending Dave Walters was recently named to the Board of Directors at Exodus Lending.

 Tara Graff Joins Mankato State Women in Leadership Advisory Board - Blaze’s SVP/Chief Communications Officer Tara Graff has been appointed to the Women in Leadership Program Advisory Board at Minnesota State University, Mankato.
